title: Disconecting Then Rejoing For The Victory
body: Hello all im not to sure if most of you people are aware of this i have recently had PC issues doesnt happen to offten may lagg out off the game for first 5minutes sometimes my team decides not to remake so i join back in do some beast alistar or thresh plays to get my team  to the enemy nexus game ends around 30 to 40minutes victory yay so now go in to after game lobby and i am punished and i loose LP and hit with a leaver buster even though it was a victory i did contribute a large portion to my teams success for victory, makes me wonder if i should ever recconect again and just be that guy if im going to loose LP so should the rest of my team but i am not like that i would like to see chanage possible any ideas to this would be great because i think 5 games  at a 20minute leaver buster is abit over board for a 5minute afk even though it is the teams fault for not remake i think if they do not remake and you rejoin back in you should not get punished im not sure. this is somthing that needs to be looked at thank you

replies.body:
Sorry if this may seem harsh, but your PC problems are your own fault so you will be punished accordingly, just as everyone else is.

Your team COULD have surrendered and you all would have lost LP anyway, OR they could have continued to play without you and possibly turned the tide of the game (a baron steal, or 1 caught out ADC can really affect the match). I'm sure your team was grateful that you did end up returning and carried them all to victory (as you described it :3), but you still AFK'd nonetheless. And to be clear, you do not get leaverbuster for abandoning only 1 game, if you show continuous afk behaviour you will be placed into low priority (this means you must've left a game or several beforehand).

Riot never restore LP or remove Low Priority unless it was a fault on their end (such as server crashes, maintenance issues, port or ISP problems), and your PC lag is not their problem or your teams problem.

I hope you find and fix the source of your lag issues and return to the rift, summoner!
